title: Reverse Engineering EVM Bytecode with Ghidra
description: Ghidra is a popular tool in reverse engineering. We developed Mothra, a Ghidra extension that enables it to work with EVM bytecode. Disassembly, CFG, and decompilation of EVM bytecode are now possible within Ghidra. In this workshop, we will discuss how Mothra is implemented and how to reverse engineer EVM smart contracts using Ghidra.
